summary.span: 包含 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 和 XML 数据简化 (XDR) 架构的缓存。

span.span: Contains a cache of XML Schema definition language (XSD) and XML-Data Reduced (XDR) schemas.

summary.span: 类已过时。

span.span: The class is obsolete.

summary.span: 请改用 。

span.span: Use instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法加载架构 ，此时架构与命名空间统一资源标识符 (URI) 相关联。Schemas are loaded using the method, at which time the schema is associated with a namespace Uniform Resource Identifier (URI). 对于 XML 架构，这通常是架构的 `targetNamespace` 属性。For XML Schemas, this will typically be the `targetNamespace` property of the schema. 尽管此类存储 XML 架构和 XDR 架构，但使用或返回的任何方法和属性都 仅适用于 XML 架构。Although this class stores both XML Schemas and XDR schemas, any method and property that takes or returns an applies to XML Schemas only. 此版本的产品支持位于 [Xml 架构第1部分：结构](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-1/) 和 [xml 架构第2部分：数据类型](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/) (W3C) xml 架构建议万维网联合会。This version of the product supports the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) XML Schema recommendation located at [XML Schema Part 1: Structures](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-1/) and [XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/). XML 架构必须引用 `http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema` 其 schema 元素中的 W3C 架构命名空间。An XML Schema must reference the W3C Schema namespace `http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema` in its schema element. 有关示例，请参阅 方法。See the method for an example. `XmlSchemaCollection` 可以使用来 有效地进行数据验证。`XmlSchemaCollection` can be used by for efficient data validation. > [!IMPORTANT] > 类在 Microsoft .NET Framework 版本2.0 中已过时，已被 类取代。The class is obsolete in the Microsoft .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the class. ## Examples 下面的示例使用验证 XML 文档 `XmlSchemaCollection` 。The following example validates an XML document using the `XmlSchemaCollection`. [!code-cpp[XmlSchemaCollection.Basic#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaCollection.Basic/CPP/aa.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaCollection.Basic#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaCollection.Basic/CS/aa.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaCollection.Basic#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaCollection.Basic/VB/aa.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `targetNamespace`特性用于标识此架构。The `targetNamespace` attribute is used to identify this schema. 如果要添加的架构包含对) 的其他命名 (空间的引用，则该 `include` `import` 应用程序的信任级别将确定如何解析这些其他命名空间。If the schema being added contains references to other namespaces (through `include` and `import` elements), the trust level of the application determines how these other namespaces are resolved. (在 .NET Framework 版本1.0 中， 始终) 始终使用默认值。(In the .NET Framework version 1.0, a default was always used). `Fully trusted code:` 默认情况下 `XmlUrlResolver` ，不使用用户凭据来解析任何外部资源。`Fully trusted code:` A default `XmlUrlResolver` with no user credentials is used to resolve any external resources. 出于验证目的，将加载这些其他命名空间的架构。The schemas for these other namespaces are loaded for validation purposes only. 与原始架构不同，这些其他架构不会显式添加到架构集合中。Unlike the original schema, these other schemas are not explicitly added to the schema collection. 因此，无法使用任何集合方法或属性访问它们。As a result, they are not accessible using any of the collection methods or properties. 如果这些外部资源位于要求身份验证的网络资源上，则使用重载，该重载采用 作为其参数之一的重载，并使用 `XmlResolver` 所需的凭据指定。If these external resources are located on a network resource that requires authentication, use an overload that takes an as one of its arguments and specify an `XmlResolver` with the necessary credentials. `Semi-trusted code:` 不解析外部引用。`Semi-trusted code:` External references are not resolved. > [!NOTE] > 如果 `XmlSchemaCollection` 使用 属性访问，则 `Add` 方法将使用 `XmlResolver` 由属性指定的 。If the `XmlSchemaCollection` is being accessed using the property, the `Add` method uses the `XmlResolver` specified by the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 类在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 中已过时，已被 类取代。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the class.

summary.span: 将在给定集合（包括其关联架构）中定义的所有命名空间添加到该集合。

span.span: Adds all the namespaces defined in the given collection (including their associated schemas) to this collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要添加的架构包含对其他命名空间的引用 (通过 `include` 和 `import` 元素或 `x-schema`) 属性，则应用程序的信任级别将确定如何解析这些其他命名空间。If the schema being added contains references to other namespaces (through `include` and `import` elements or the `x-schema` attribute), the trust level of the application determines how these other namespaces are resolved. (在 .NET Framework 版本1.0 中， 始终) 始终使用默认值。(In the .NET Framework version 1.0, a default was always used). `Fully trusted code:` 默认情况下 `XmlUrlResolver` ，不使用用户凭据来解析任何外部资源。`Fully trusted code:` A default `XmlUrlResolver` with no user credentials is used to resolve any external resources. 出于验证目的，将加载这些其他命名空间的架构。The schemas for these other namespaces are loaded for validation purposes only. 与原始架构不同，这些其他架构不会显式添加到架构集合中。Unlike the original schema, these other schemas are not explicitly added to the schema collection. 因此，无法使用任何集合方法或属性访问它们。As a result, they are not accessible using any of the collection methods or properties. 如果这些外部资源位于要求身份验证的网络资源上，则使用重载，该重载采用 作为其参数之一的重载，并使用 `XmlResolver` 所需的凭据指定。If these external resources are located on a network resource that requires authentication, use an overload that takes an as one of its arguments and specify an `XmlResolver` with the necessary credentials. `Semi-trusted code:` 不解析外部引用。`Semi-trusted code:` External references are not resolved. > [!NOTE] > 如果 `XmlSchemaCollection` 使用 属性访问，则 `Add` 方法将使用 `XmlResolver` 由属性指定的 。If the `XmlSchemaCollection` is being accessed using the property, the `Add` method uses the `XmlResolver` specified by the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 类在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 中已过时，已被 类取代。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the class.

Public Function Add (ns As String, uri As String) As XmlSchema
public: System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchema ^ Add(System::String ^ ns, System::String ^ uri);

param.name: ns
param.span: 与架构关联的命名空间 URI。

span.span: The namespace URI associated with the schema.

param.span: 对于 XML 架构，这通常是 。

span.span: For XML Schemas, this will typically be the .

param.name: uri
param.span: 指定要加载的架构的 URL。

summary.span: 将由给定的 URL 定位的架构添加到架构集合中。

span.span: Adds the schema located by the given URL into the schema collection.

returns.span: 添加到架构集合中的 ；如果所添加的架构为 XDR 架构，或者如果架构中有编译错误，则为 。

span.span: The added to the schema collection; if the schema being added is an XDR schema or if there are compilation errors in the schema.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已 `ns` 与集合中的另一个架构关联，则添加的架构将替换集合中的原始架构。If `ns` has already been associated with another schema in the collection, the schema being added replaces the original schema in the collection. 例如，在以下 c # 代码中，将从集合中删除作者 .xsd。添加了 xsd。For example, in the following C# code, authors.xsd is removed from the collection and names.xsd is added. ``` schemaColl.Add("urn:author", "authors.xsd"); schemaColl.Add("urn:author", "names.xsd"); ``` 如果 `ns` 为， `null` 并且要添加的架构是 xml 架构，则 `Add` 方法使用 `targetNamespace` xml 架构中定义的来标识集合中的架构。If `ns` is `null` and the schema being added is an XML Schema, the `Add` method uses the `targetNamespace` defined in the XML Schema to identify the schema in the collection. 如果要添加的架构包含对其他命名空间的引用 (通过 `include` 和 `import` 元素或 `x-schema`) 属性，则应用程序的信任级别将确定如何解析这些其他命名空间。If the schema being added contains references to other namespaces (through `include` and `import` elements or the `x-schema` attribute), the trust level of the application determines how these other namespaces are resolved. (在 .NET Framework 版本1.0 中， 始终) 始终使用默认值。(In the .NET Framework version 1.0, a default was always used). `Fully trusted code:` 默认情况下 `XmlUrlResolver` ，不使用用户凭据来解析任何外部资源。`Fully trusted code:` A default `XmlUrlResolver` with no user credentials is used to resolve any external resources. 出于验证目的，将加载这些其他命名空间的架构。The schemas for these other namespaces are loaded for validation purposes only. 与原始架构不同，这些其他架构不会显式添加到架构集合中。Unlike the original schema, these other schemas are not explicitly added to the schema collection. 因此，无法使用任何集合方法或属性访问它们。As a result, they are not accessible using any of the collection methods or properties. 如果这些外部资源位于要求身份验证的网络资源上，则使用重载，该重载采用 作为其参数之一的重载，并使用 `XmlResolver` 所需的凭据指定。If these external resources are located on a network resource that requires authentication, use an overload that takes an as one of its arguments and specify an `XmlResolver` with the necessary credentials. `Semi-trusted code:` 不解析外部引用。`Semi-trusted code:` External references are not resolved. > [!NOTE] > 如果 `XmlSchemaCollection` 使用 属性访问，则 `Add` 方法将使用 `XmlResolver` 由属性指定的 。If the `XmlSchemaCollection` is being accessed using the property, the `Add` method uses the `XmlResolver` specified by the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 类在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 中已过时，已被 类取代。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the class. ## Examples 下面的示例使用中存储的架构验证三个 XML 文件 `XmlSchemaCollection` 。The following example validates three XML files using schemas stored in the `XmlSchemaCollection`. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 该示例使用以下五个输入文件：The sample uses the following five input files: `booksSchema.xml` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/XML/source.xml#2)] `booksSchemaFail.xml` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/XML/source.xml#3)] `newbooks.xml` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#4](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/XML/source.xml#4)] `books.xsd` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#5](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/XML/source.xml#5)] `schema1.xdr` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#6](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/XML/source.xml#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `targetNamespace`特性用于标识此架构。The `targetNamespace` attribute is used to identify this schema. 如果架构包含 `include` `import` 引用其他命名空间的和元素，则将加载这些其他命名空间的架构，以便仅用于验证目的。If the schema contains `include` and `import` elements that reference other namespaces, the schemas for these other namespaces are loaded for validation purposes only. 与原始架构不同，这些其他架构不会显式添加到架构集合中。Unlike the original schema, these other schemas are not explicitly added to the schema collection. 因此，无法使用任何集合方法或属性访问它们。As a result, they are not accessible using any of the collection methods or properties. > [!IMPORTANT] > 类在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 中已过时，已被 类取代。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the class. ## Examples 下面的示例将架构添加到集合中。The following example adds a schema to the collection. 传递给方法，该 `Add` 方法设置访问架构中引用的任何外部资源所需的必要凭据。An is passed to the `Add` method which sets the necessary credentials required to access any external resources referenced in the schema. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已 `ns` 与集合中的另一个架构关联，则添加的架构将替换集合中的原始架构。If `ns` has already been associated with another schema in the collection, the schema being added replaces the original schema in the collection. 如果 `ns` 为， `null` 并且要添加的架构是 xml 架构，则该 `Add` 方法使用 `targetNamespace` 在 xml 架构中定义的属性来标识集合中的架构。If `ns` is `null` and the schema being added is an XML Schema, the `Add` method uses the `targetNamespace` attribute defined in the XML Schema to identify the schema in the collection. 如果要添加的架构包含对其他命名空间的引用 (通过 `include` 和 `import` 元素或 `x-schema`) 属性，则出于验证目的，将加载这些其他命名空间的架构。If the schema being added contains references to other namespaces (through `include` and `import` elements or the `x-schema` attribute), the schemas for these other namespaces are loaded for validation purposes only. 与原始架构不同，这些其他架构不会显式添加到架构集合中。Unlike the original schema, these other schemas are not explicitly added to the schema collection. 因此，无法使用任何集合方法或属性访问它们。As a result, they are not accessible using any of the collection methods or properties. > [!IMPORTANT] > 类在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 中已过时，已被 类取代。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the class.

exception.span: 此架构不是有效的架构。

span.span: The schema is not a valid schema.

summary.span: 设置事件处理程序，以接收 XDR 和 XML 架构验证错误的相关信息。

span.span: Sets an event handler for receiving information about the XDR and XML schema validation errors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将架构添加到集合时，会发生这些事件。These events occur when the schemas are added to the collection. 如果未提供事件处理程序，则会 在为的任何验证错误上引发 `XmlSeverityType.Error` 。If an event handler is not provided, an is thrown on any validation errors where the is `XmlSeverityType.Error`. 若要指定事件处理程序，请定义一个回调函数，并将其添加到中 `ValidationEventHandler` 。To specify an event handler, define a callback function and add it to the `ValidationEventHandler`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 类在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 中已过时，已被 类取代。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置事件处理程序来处理无效的 XML 架构。The following example shows how to set an event handler to handle invalid XML Schemas. [!code-cpp[XmlSchema.ValidationEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchema.ValidationEventHandler/CPP/schemaevent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlSchema.ValidationEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchema.ValidationEventHandler/CS/schemaevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchema.ValidationEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchema.ValidationEventHandler/VB/schemaevent.vb#1)] 前面的示例使用文件 `invalid.xsd` 作为输入。The preceding example uses the file `invalid.xsd` as input. [!code-xml[XmlSchema.ValidationEventHandler#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchema.ValidationEventHandler/XML/invalid.xsd#2)]
